name: headstand
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of balancing upside down on your head, using your hands or bent arms to support you: do a headstand She learned how to do a headstand when she was 50 years old. Yoga includes standing, sitting, and inverted postures, like headstands. Compare
handstand
IndiaPix/IndiaPicture/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesMy days of being able to do cartwheels and headstands are long gone.He was showing off about how long he could stay in a headstand.I once embarrassed myself by falling over during a headstand.
